register.title: Register

user.label: User
activityTracker.title: Activity Tracking
activityTracker.descriptionHint: A short description of the activity being performed
activityTracker.tagsHint: Tags should be separated by commas (e.g., work, project, urgent)
toast.activityStartError: Could not start activity. Please try again.
toast.activityFinishError: Could not finish activity. Please try again.
toast.activityDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting the activity. Please try again.
toast.activityUpdateError: An error occurred while updating the activity. Please try again.
apiError.dailyLimitReached: You have reached the daily activity limit for your current plan.
apiError.categoriesLimitReached: You have reached the maximum limit of categories.
apiError.uniqueViolation: An entry with this name or address already exists. Please try a different name.
apiError.notNullViolation: Please fill in all fields marked as required.
apiError.foreignKeyViolation: Could not save data. The selected category or parent resource is invalid/does not exist.
apiError.unauthorized: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
apiError.forbidden: Permission denied. You are not authorized to perform this operation.
apiError.networkFailure: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
apiError.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.
activitiesTable.noActivitiesFoundForMont: No activities found for the selected month.
deleteActivityDialog.title: Confirm activity deletion
deleteActivityDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this activity? This operation cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the record.
activitySheet.editDescription: Make changes to the details of this activity.
activitySheet.viewDescription: View all details regarding the selected activity.
